login.title: Sign In
login.heading: Log In
login.welcomeBack: Welcome Back to [THC] Chiller & Killer Hub
login.welcomeText: Sign in with an email address or username to access the full [THC] Chiller & Killer community platform. Once authenticated, members can read announcements, coordinate events, join forum discussions, and use the messaging system to stay aligned with the alliance. The platform is designed to be fast, secure, and accessible from any device.
login.aboutPlatform: [THC] Chiller & Killer is the central management hub for our Total Battle alliance. It brings announcements, event planning, forum collaboration, direct messaging, bug reporting, and member administration together in one place.
login.afterSignIn: What You Can Do After Signing In
login.feature1: Read pinned announcements and clan updates
login.feature2: Track upcoming events and schedules in the calendar
login.feature3: Join forum discussions and reply to threads
login.feature4: Send direct, clan, and global messages
login.feature5: Manage your profile, game accounts, and notification preferences
login.feature6: Submit and follow bug reports with screenshots
login.feature7: Use role-based admin tools when permissions allow
login.secureAuthText: [THC] Chiller & Killer uses Supabase Auth for secure session management. All credentials are encrypted in transit and at rest, following industry best practices for web application security. The platform supports email-based login as well as username lookup, so members can sign in with whichever identifier they prefer. Sessions are maintained securely with HTTP-only cookies, and row-level security policies ensure that each member only accesses information relevant to their assigned division. Two-factor authentication support and automatic session expiration provide additional layers of account protection. If access has been lost, use the

register.heading: Create Account
register.created: Account created. Check your email to verify.

register.successStep1Text: Open your inbox and click the confirmation link to activate your account.

register.joinText: Create an account to apply for membership in [THC] Chiller & Killer, a competitive Total Battle alliance that values teamwork, strategic planning, and active participation. Registration is the first step toward accessing our full suite of community tools and resources. The [THC] Chiller & Killer platform brings announcements, events, forum collaboration, messaging, and member tools together in one place.
register.afterRegText: After creating an account, a verification email will be sent to the provided address. Once the email is verified, an administrator reviews the application and assigns the new member to the appropriate division within the alliance. This review process typically takes 24 to 48 hours, and a confirmation email is sent once the application has been approved. Upon approval, the full [THC] Chiller & Killer platform becomes accessible immediately.

forgot.title: Reset Password
forgot.heading: Reset Password
forgot.description: Enter the email address associated with your [THC] Chiller & Killer account and we will send you a secure link to create a new password.
forgot.sent: Reset email sent. Check your inbox.
forgot.recoveryText: Lost access to the [THC] Chiller & Killer platform? The password reset process is straightforward and secure. Use the form above to request a recovery link, which will be sent to the email address associated with the account. The link remains valid for a limited time to ensure security. This page is available to all visitors and does not require an active session. Once your password is reset, you will regain full access to all platform features including performance analytics, event coordination, and the messaging system.
forgot.step1: Enter the email address linked to the account in the form above
forgot.step2: Check the inbox for a message from [THC] Chiller & Killer
forgot.step3: Click the secure recovery link in the email
forgot.step4: Choose a new password and confirm it on the update page
forgot.step5: Sign in with the updated credentials to resume access
forgot.troubleshootingText: If the reset email does not arrive within a few minutes, check the spam or junk folder. Ensure the entered email matches the one used during registration. Members who continue to experience issues should reach out to our team through the
forgot.orDiscord: or via Discord for personalized assistance.
forgot.securityText: All password reset links are generated securely through Supabase Auth and encrypted in transit via TLS. We never store passwords in plain text, and the platform enforces modern security standards including Content-Security-Policy headers, Strict-Transport-Security, and row-level database access controls. Password reset tokens expire automatically after a limited time window, preventing unauthorized reuse. This ensures that member accounts remain protected at every level.

forgot.toSignIn: to sign in. Need a new account instead?
forgot.toLearnMore: to learn more about [THC] Chiller & Killer community, or read the

home.howItWorksText1: [THC] Chiller & Killer is a purpose-built community hub that brings together everything our members need in one place. Announcements, event planning, forum discussions, direct messaging, and member management all live in a single workflow. Our event calendar keeps everyone aligned on war schedules, training sessions, and guild meetings, while leaders use the admin panel for user management, moderation, and approval workflows.

about.title: About [THC] Chiller & Killer
about.missionByline: Written by [THC] Chiller & Killer Leadership Team
about.missionText1: [THC] Chiller & Killer are a dedicated Total Battle alliance that believes in coordinated play, informed decision making, and a welcoming community. [THC] Chiller & Killer is our custom-built platform that helps us stay organized, track performance, and communicate effectively across every division of our growing community.
about.missionText2: We created this platform because off-the-shelf tools could not meet the specific needs of a competitive Total Battle group. From event coordination and forum moderation to approvals and direct messaging, every feature was designed by members, for members. Our goal is to remove the friction of managing a large alliance so that leaders can focus on strategy and players can focus on contributing to collective success.
about.missionText3: Whether you are a seasoned veteran or a newcomer exploring competitive gameplay for the first time, [THC] Chiller & Killer provides the tools and resources you need to thrive. We believe that transparency, shared goals, and mutual respect form the foundation of a strong gaming community, and every feature on this platform reflects those principles.
about.techText1: [THC] Chiller & Killer is built with Next.js and TypeScript on the frontend, powered by Supabase for authentication, real-time updates, and PostgreSQL storage. The platform is deployed on Vercel for optimal performance and global availability, ensuring fast load times regardless of where our members are located.
about.techText2: We follow modern web best practices including responsive design, accessibility standards (WCAG), progressive enhancement, and security-first architecture with row-level security policies. Every page is optimized for search engines, uses semantic HTML, and meets accessibility guidelines to ensure an inclusive experience for all users.
about.ctaText: Interested in joining [THC] Chiller & Killer? We are always looking for dedicated players who value teamwork and want to be part of an organized, competitive alliance.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy & Data Protection
privacyPolicy.byline: Published by [THC] Chiller & Killer Leadership Team
privacyPolicy.section1Text: [THC] Chiller & Killer ("we", "us", "our") operates a community hub for [THC] Chiller & Killer Total Battle clan. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform at totalchiller.de.
privacyPolicy.section2Text: We collect the following categories of personal information:
privacyPolicy.section2Item1: Account details — email address, username, and display name provided during registration.
privacyPolicy.section2Item2: Game records — in-game usernames, clan memberships, and profile metadata used for community organization.
privacyPolicy.section2Item3: Usage activity — pages viewed, features used, and timestamps, collected automatically via server logs.
privacyPolicy.section2Item4: Authentication tokens — session cookies managed by Supabase Auth for secure sign-in.
privacyPolicy.section3Text: The information we gather is used to:
privacyPolicy.section3Item1: Provide and maintain the community platform and its features.
privacyPolicy.section3Item2: Verify member identity and manage alliance memberships.
privacyPolicy.section3Item3: Display member directory information, announcements, and event schedules.
privacyPolicy.section3Item4: Send notifications about events, news, and system updates (based on member preferences).
privacyPolicy.section3Item5: Improve the platform through aggregated, anonymized analytics.
privacyPolicy.section4Text: All records are stored in Supabase-managed PostgreSQL databases with row-level security policies. Information in transit is encrypted via TLS. We implement security headers including Content-Security-Policy, Strict-Transport-Security, and X-Frame-Options to protect against common web attacks.
privacyPolicy.section5Text: We use the following third-party services:
privacyPolicy.section5Note: These providers have their own privacy policies governing the data they process.
privacyPolicy.section6Text: Every member has the right to:
privacyPolicy.section6Item1: Access, correct, or delete personal information via the Settings page.
privacyPolicy.section6Item3: Withdraw consent for optional processing at any time.
privacyPolicy.section6Item4: Lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority if rights have been violated.
privacyPolicy.section7Text: We retain account information for as long as the account remains active. Operational records (such as announcements, events, and moderation logs) are retained as needed to run the community platform. Members may request full deletion of their information by contacting us through the methods described below.
privacyPolicy.section8Text: We use essential cookies for authentication session management. We do not use tracking or advertising cookies.
privacyPolicy.section9Text: For privacy-related questions or information requests, please visit our
privacyPolicy.section9OrDiscord: or reach out via Discord. You can also return to the
privacyPolicy.section9ForInfo: for general information about the platform.
privacyPolicy.section10Text: We may update this policy from time to time. The "Last updated" date at the top of this page reflects the most recent revision. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of any changes.
